entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saint John Airport 02:00 AM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 100 %
Dewpoint: 7.9°C
Wind: SE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening. Periods of rain beginning near midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 5 mm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
